text:
The documentation for RewriteMap's MapTypeOptions was inadvertently backported to 2.4 from the trunk. The 2.4 version of mod_rewrite does not expect the MapTypeOptions argument.

Documentation link:
https://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/mod/mod_rewrite.html
creator: hwibell@gmail.com

text:
Thk,

this has been taken into account in r1747804.
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
